papandu sammelanaye nilathalawalata pathwu ayagen 60%k pamana pirisa papandu kridawa gana kisidu danumak nathi aya bawa krida amathi mahindananda aluthgamage mahatha pawasayi.ebawin papandu sammelanaye siyalu niladharin kandawa papandu kridawa nanga situwimata awadharanaya kala bawath ese nowanne nam dadi thindu gena thanathuruwalin iwath kirime anathuru agawima kala bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya.krida amathi mahindananda aluthgamage mahatha mese pawasuwe ratapura athi papandu liga 47ka niladharin ha papandu sammelanaye widhayaka niladharin idiriyediya.eeye papandu niwahanedi pawathi papandu lig saha widhayaka sabha niladharinge raswimen pasuwa rupiyal laksha gananak watina faks yanthra saha papandu krida upakarana beda dimakda siduwiya.

diwayina pura pihiti purawidya watinakamin yuth gal parwatha kadinamin pariksha kirime wyapruthiyak labana wasare aarambha kirimata mudal amathyanshaye lekam pi.bi.jayasundara mahatha purawidya departhamenthuwata upades laba di thibe.sanwardhana wyapruthi sandaha gal parwatha kadimata illim wishala pramanayak dainikawa departhamenthuwata idiripathwe.mehidi purawidya balapam agayime nithiya yatathe sanwardhakaya wisin sanwardhana samikshanayak sidu kara gatha yuthuya.ema thaththwayata muhunadima sandaha merata pihiti siyaluma gal parwatha kadinam gaweshana wyapruthiyak yatathe pariksha kara purawidyathmaka watinakamak athi gal parwatha handuna ganime aramunin mema wyapruthiya kriyathmaka kirimata purawidya departhamenthuwa thiranaya kara thibe.mehidi handunaganu labana purawidya wadagathkamak nathi gal parwatha purawidya departhamenthuwe wimasimakin thorawa adala karya sandaha sanwardhanayata nidahas kirimata hakiwana paridi pradeshiya lekam karyala, parisara adhikariya saha bhu widya ha pathal karyanshaya athulu anikuth adala aayathana danuwath kirimata da purawidya departhamenthuwa thiranaya kara athi athara labana wasare aarambhaye sita kriyawata nagena mema wyapruthiya sarthaka kara ganima sandaha departhamenthuwa mahajana sahaya apeksha kere.mema wyapruthiya muwawen wanchanika piris purawidyathmaka wadagathkamak sahitha gal parwatha ayuthu bhawithayata yoda ganimata idakada athi bawin ese paminena departhamenthu niladharinge ananyathawa thahawuru kara ganna lesa purawidya adhyaksha janaral aacharya senarath disanayaka janathawagen illa sitiyi.
